item.text: Welcome to this [[Federated Wiki]] site. From this page you can find who we are and what we do. New sites provide this information and then claim the site as their own. You will need your own site to participate.

item.prompt:
Link to a page about yourself here. Type your name enclosed in double square brackets. Then press Command/ALT-S to save.

Make all pages here yours alone with the login below.

item.text: Pages where we do and share.

item.prompt: Create pages about things you do on this wiki. Type a descriptive name of something you will be writing about. Enclose it in square brackets. Then press Command/ALT-S to save.

item.text: You can edit your copy of these pages. Press [+] to add more writing spaces. Read [[How to Wiki]] for more ideas. Follow [[Recent Changes]] here and nearby.

item.prompt:

item.text: My name is Philip Saunders. I'm from Ireland and I'm a poet, philosopher and civic entrepreneur.

item.prompt: Create pages about things you do on this wiki. Type a descriptive name of something you will be writing about. Enclose it in square brackets. Then press Command/ALT-S to save.

item.text: This is an experimental federated wiki for the future Pax Academy. [[Pax]] is a civic ordery in which free citizens can be part of a network, resolve disputes, register land and an almost limitless number of other services which can be built by citizens themselves. The educational aspect of Pax is called the Pax Academy.

item.text: Take a look around! You can follow the links, read the wikis and fork them to add a wiki to your own page. I will constantly be revising, editing and adding to this federated wiki so that it will constantly expand and increase in sophistication. Federated wikis are an inherently new and experimental way of writing, thinking and sharing, so I would advise a certain amount of patience.
If you want to find out what this process is all about, I invite you to read [[How to Wiki]].
